name: Doctor Jay's Brutal Extreme 1976
description:
This game is for Mini Jam 99 ("Birds")

This is my first "finished" game in Godot which I am still learning. I only spent a couple of hours on this in between life demands but I'm pretty happy with how it turned out.

This is a 1979 home port of Doctor Jay Brutal Extreme 1976. It has none of the gore and dismemberment of the arcade original but the gameplay is otherwise intact.
